author: Bernard
title: Observer bias and detection probability in underwater visual census of fish assemblages measured with independent double-observers
paper_background: underwater fish survey transects by volunteers and researchers, same transects done by both, study compared the (modeled) probability of surveyer detecting 4 fish species as a function of abundance. See Table 4 and Figure 5. How to incorporate error?
methods_notes: used Tabula to get values + SE from table 4 for each species (Steentjie, Fransmadam, Redfingers, Blue hottentot), transposed in excel, copy + paste. Intermediate file "tabula_bernard.csv"

author: Cox
title: Expert variability provides perspective on the strengths and weaknesses of citizen-driven intertidal monitoring program
paper_background: researchers and students sampled 8 intertidal sites, calculated Shannon diversity indices for both and compared. 2 researcher teams and 1 student team… how to compare?
methods_notes: copy figure into paint, save as PNG, import into Plot Digitizer, click on series of points

author: Vianna
title: Acoustic Telemetry Validates a Citizen Science Approach for Monitoring Sharks on Coral Reefs
paper_background: comparing recreational diver data to passive acoustic telemetry data.
